metadata.Title: CVE-2023-38552 on Ubuntu 18.04 ESM (bionic) - medium
metadata.Description: When the Node.js policy feature checks the integrity of a resource againsta trusted manifest, the application can intercept the operation and returna forged checksum to the node's policy implementation, thus effectivelydisabling the integrity check. Impacts: This vulnerability affects allusers using the experimental policy mechanism in all active release lines:18.x and, 20.x. Please note that at the time this CVE was issued, thepolicy mechanism is an experimental feature of Node.js.

criterions.comment: nodejs package in esm-apps/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
